sentences.en: a career in nursing
sentences.cn: 护理生涯

sentences.en: Canseco, nursing a back injury, struck out.
sentences.cn: 坎塞科因背部受伤而三振出局。

sentences.en: Does the nursing staff seem to care?
sentences.cn: 护理人员看上去在乎吗？

sentences.en: He died in a nursing home at the age of 87.
sentences.cn: 他在一家养老院去世，享年87岁。

sentences.en: I’d love to go into nursing.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意从事护理行业。

sentences.en: Much was spent nursing the place back to health.
sentences.cn: 为了修缮这个地方使之重放光彩而花费了不少钱.

sentences.en: Nursing is hard work, but it can be very fulfilling.
sentences.cn: 护士工作很艰苦; 但可以使人感到满足.

sentences.en: Nursing is not just a job—it's a vocation.
sentences.cn: 护理不仅仅是一项工作，而且还是一种职业。

sentences.en: Nursing was ill-paid and grindingly hard work.
sentences.cn: 护理工作薪水微薄，艰苦难耐。

sentences.en: psychiatric nursing
sentences.cn: 精神病人的护理

sentences.en: She resolved to report the matter to the hospital's nursing manager.
sentences.cn: 她决定把这件事汇报给医院的护士长。

sentences.en: Some have regular clinics staffed by nursing officers.
sentences.cn: 一些设有配备护理军官的常规诊所。

sentences.en: The baby is nursing at its mother's breasts.
sentences.cn: 那孩子正在吃妈妈的奶.

sentences.en: The course leads to a diploma in psychiatric nursing.
sentences.cn: 读完这门课程可以获得精神病护理文凭.

sentences.en: The elderly at the nursing home have some protections, but not much.
sentences.cn: 看护之家的老人们已经受到一些保护，但这类措施为数不多。

sentences.en: The hotel is going to be converted into a nursing home.
sentences.cn: 那家旅馆将被改建成私人疗养院。

sentences.en: The Matron at the nursing home expressed a wish to attend.
sentences.cn: 养老院的护士长说她愿意参加。

sentences.en: the nursing profession
sentences.cn: 护理专业

sentences.en: We struggle to maintain a little dignity, but look at us, " said one resident of the nursing home.
sentences.cn: 看护之家的一位老人说：“我们想尽量维持一点尊严，可是看看自己这样子。”

sentences.en: Young people and nursing mothers are exempted from charges.
sentences.cn: 未成年人和哺乳期女性免予起诉。

words.tran_cn: 养成；教育；培养（形容词nurturant）；养育
看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶

trans.tran_en: the job or skill of looking after people who are ill, injured, or old

trans.tran_cn: 护理( nurse的现在分词)，照料，喂，吃奶
